Key Match Events: Donovan Mitchell scored a season-high 37 points, 18 in the fourth quarter to put away the Bulls
Post-Match Reflections: Kenny Atkinson angrily slammed a shower sandal in locker room at halftime
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavs allowed 73 points in the first half
Others: The Cavs are the sixth team in league history to win their first 14 games and the first since the 2015-16 Golden State Warriors
